Aude Gemma Billard.Alma mater: B.S. and M.S. École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL), M.S. and Ph.D. University of Edinburgh
Aude Gemma Billard.Known for: Applying machine learning to robotics to improve learning and task performance
Aude Gemma Billard.Awards: 2016 Nominated as Member of SATW, Swiss Academy of Engineering Sciences, 2016 Nominated for Outstanding Women in Academics SNSF, 2015 King-Sun Fu Best Transactions Paper Award, IEEE & Robotics and Automation Society, 2003 The Outstanding Young Person in Science and Innovation, Junior Chamber of Commerce, 2002 SNF Professeur Boursier, Career Award from Swiss National Science Foundation, 2001 Innovative Teaching Grant - Intel Corporation, 1999 Fellowship Medicus Foundation, 1996-97 Scholarship, Swiss National Science Foundation
